info.name: Southperry.net - cloud background update
info.description: An update to the other cloud background style.
info.additionalInfo:
v.01 - Feb 12, 2012 - release
v.02 - Mar 26, 2014 - fix @-moz-document url formatting

Since 2009, Southperry has updated vB versions and whatnot, thus changing how the other style looks. Here's an updated version.

options.label: Enabled
options.value: background: transparent url(http://i42.tinypic.com/24vsjfq.jpg) repeat-x fixed left bottom !important;
